videos.description: Goran Dragic takes the ball full court for a teardrop lay-in through contact.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dragic weaves through defenders for tough and-1) 2021/5/2 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dragic weaves through defenders for tough and-1

videos.description: LaMelo Ball's full-court assist finds Terry Rozier, who lays it in as the first-half buzzer sounds.

videos.headline: LaMelo heaves full-court pass for Rozier's buzzer-beating bucket

videos.description: Jimmy Butler blows by Miles Bridges and throws down the dunk.
